column1: Little Goat Diner////This restaurant definitely deserves a 5 star rating for its service and food quality but the price point seemed a bit high. In my humble opinion
column2: a restaurant self described as being a diner shouldn't charge high end sit down restaurant prices. But then again
column3: with an average of 45 minute waiting list
column4: they probably need to charge more to keep the hipsters away.
